page 2 bohoknits instructions alternate colours every round make a slip knot chain 6 join in a ring with a slip_stitch round 1 chain 3 first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in space 1 square made *chain 3 3 double_crochet in same space* repeat from * to * three times total 4 squares made chain 3 insert hook into first chain 3 made at beg of round and yo with next colour pull through cut first colour turn ws should now be facing you round 2 chain 3 first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in space chain 3 3 double_crochet in same space *chain 1 3 double_crochet in space chain 3 3 double_crochet in same space* repeat from * to * three times total 8 squares made chain 1 slip_stitch into first chain 3 change colours as before turn notes round 3 chain 3 first double_crochet 2 dcs in space *chain 1 3 dcs in make sure you are working two squares in cid 63 space chain 3 3 dcs in same space chain 1 3 dcs in next space* every corner repeat from * to * three times end 3 dcs in space chain 3 3 don t forget to turn your blanket at the end of cid 63 dcs in
